New Records: Quinton de Kock scored 74 off 40 balls.
Anrich Nortje and Kagiso Rabada contributed significantly with key dismissals.
South Africa set a target of 195 for the USA.
Andries Gous scored an unbeaten 80 from 47 balls.
Key Match Events: USA's close chase but eventual loss by 18 runs.
Key dismissals including Corey Anderson and Steven Taylor.
Pre-Game Insights: USA won the toss and chose to bat first.
South Africa's batting was expected to be strong.
Post-Match Reflections: Aidan Markram praised the team's performance.
Aaron Jones acknowledged the loss but highlighted future potential.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was South Africa's first in Group 2.
The high-scoring nature of the game.
Others: USA's debut in the T20 World Cup.
